layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 259x18
          text run at (0,0) width 259: "These lines should have the same width:"
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,18) size 784x42
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 91x20
          text run at (0,0) width 91: ". . . . . . . . a"
        LayoutBR {BR} at (90,16) size 1x0
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,21) size 91x20
          text run at (0,21) width 91: ". . . . . . . . a\x{300}"
